attributes.action: Change drug laws so that repeat offenders such as the "famed" Pete Docherty & others in his position can no longer evade justice and put others at risk.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For far too long Mr Docherty has ridiculed this countries drug laws. Please can we change our drug laws so that addicts such as Mr Docherty, and others, can no longer put innocent lives at risk when under the influence of class A narcotics especially when they decide to get behind the wheel of a car (for one example).
